prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. He then returns his gaze to the front, completing the turn with a subtle nod and a relaxed posture. His right hand rests near his waist, occasionally lifting just enough to accentuate a point. The entire movement is smooth and unhurried, conveying confidence and poise. Lighting is harsh and uneven, casting extreme shadows and blown-out highlights, creating a garish, low-quality studio effect with visible noise and compression artifacts. Camera shakes violently, zooms erratically, and shifts framing unpredictably, capturing fragmented torso shots and distorted close-ups. Overall tone is chaotic, amateurish, and visually painful — an unrealistic 3D animation with extreme contrast, oversharpened edges, heavy grain, embedded logos, and text overlays, evoking glitch art rather than human expression.
